content.detailedDescription:
F.I. 9426 received this report from rufos (roundtown ufo society)
see this witnesses original reports to rufos also to ufos northwest in the 'file attachments to investigation report'
content.summary: Lighting like flashing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along in a truck when i noticed a semi bright blue light in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane but when it stopped in mid air i knew it wasn't as planes don't do that. it wasn't moving very fast but as soon as it stopped it kinda came closer to the ground, to where it was probably about 10,000 feet off the ground then it started back in the direction that it came from. i pulled the truck over and stopped. i got out of the truck and looked up and the object and it stopped again then it sort of zig zagged left then right then the object split into to lights. i followed them as far as i could with my eye but i lost them after a few minutes. i wasn't very afraid as i always knew that there was something out there other then us. strangely enough throughout the entire event i felt oddly at ease. one of the most calm times i have ever had that i can remember.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a ufo that definitely wasn't anything human made.

content.detailedDescription: While driving from arizona to eagle colorado for the holidays i had turned onto i-70 and somewhere (we wrote down the mile marker but cannot find it at the moment) between the utah border and fruita my wife and i were talking.  the radio was low and our little girl and dog were sound asleep in the back.  it was a clear, cold colorado winter night.  suddenly from the north this huge green-yellow phosphorescent triangular shaped ball of light came across the sky right in front of us!  it was so bright and it had a rooster-tail like plume coming off the top of it.  in the center of it the light was so bright it almost hurt to look at it.  at first i thought it was a meteor but then it slowed down and then speeded up again going north to south.  my wife could not stop saying "what is that?! what is that?!" it was pretty frightning.  suddenly these red lights shot out the back of it while it seemed to hover and then it quickly changed direction and rocketed off to the east (same direction we were traveling) moving so fast that it became a pinpoit of light in a matter of seconds!!  we looked for it to come back all the way to eagle.  i have witnessed a few other ufo's in my lifetime but i am so glad my skeptical wife was able to witness this with me.  she is still in disbelief.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A green-yellow phosphorescent ball of light dropped out of a dark winter night.

content.detailedDescription: I have taken pictures every night at the same time for a couple of nights now.  when i take the pictures there are some times alot of them and sometimes less.  i have pictures of ufos where you can see there faces and bodies of the aliens and i have 1 where the ufo looks like human heads.  these things that i have taken pictures can not be seen by human, only when i look at the pictures do they show up.  dates beginning 3-8-09 and i have and will continue to take the photos each night.   i am at a loss of words, the photos have been shown to my kids and my wife refuses to look at them because they freak her out.
content.summary: Faces seen in ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
hi. 7:40pm, we go outside as usual. the same bright light is there again different location different colors, but still to the west. it's hovering, and blinking. my boyfriend is speaking to the investigator, and doing so i'm looking to east out of no where 3-4 blinking lights appeared in the shape of a triangle. it was going toward object number one. as it nears that it jerks to the left towards the mountains. it descends into them. then~ something from the south, most likely a jet/plane goes directly to the location of object #2. that was the end of it.

 we go back out at 8:40ishpm. the first object is gone but we notice two jets coming from the east going above us to the mountains. after they're half way there theres a loud noise. almost canon like or "ba boom". we look back and 5 more jets are spread out coming from north and east. they all disappeared along with the first two behind the mountains.
content.summary: 2 unidentified objects, 8 different jets.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard looking off to the west and had an unobstructed view of approximately half a mile or more, and above the roofline between the sillhouette of two mountain tops i saw a series of six lights.  i have studied the lights and being familar with the skyline i knew these were new and unusual.  i waited approximately 15 mintues to see if they would move or change and they did not.  i went quickly into the house to get my camera, and this approximately one minute, i returned to the back yard with camera and photographed the skyline and lights wich were unchanged.  i waited approximately five minutes longer and then went to my vehicle drove approximately five minutes, lost visual, returned to my back yard and they were gone. i did not witness their leaving or disappearance.  i then sat waiting hoping they would return and noticed a brief return of one individual light in similar position in the sky, but further south on the horizon.  this appeared in front of me, and then disappeared as if a cloak was covering it from one side and then was gone.  i then drove approximately 1/4 mile to my moms, picked her up and together we drove approximately 100 yards to the edge of our neighborhood.  we sat looking into the night sky to the west, hoping for a nother glimpse or sighting.  we waited approximately 15 minutes, and again south of the original sighting two more lights appeared.  this was witnessed by my mom as well.  these remained in the sky approximately three minutes, and then disappeared as per the single sighting, as if a cloak covered the two lights. then using binoculars i searched the skies and noticed sporadic silver individual sparkler like objects that were silver flashing on and off throughout the field of vision in the binoculars as if strobing and changing position. these were not visible with the naked eye.  we then waited another twenty minutes, and no other lights appeared.  we drove approximately five miles to another location, waited approximately twenty minutes, no further sightings and we returned home.  photo to be attached later  i am using christine dickey's e-mail address as i do not have one.
content.summary: Oval shaped six amber lights in a row, four to the right and two to the left slightly staggered.

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from dinner at 7:30pm, february 12, 2009. it was a very clear, cold night. as we walked up onto our deck at the back of our house, my husband was looking for his house keys to open the back door. the back house light was off, so it was dark. i looked up to admire the stars in the clear night sky, when i saw this object move over our house. it wasn't very high in the sky. my husband thinks maybe about 1000 feet off the ground. i don't think it was quite that high. we thought it was some type of aircraft, but at that height there should have been some kind of sound. there was no sound...No sound at all. the entire shape was a large black triangle, much bigger than our house, with 8 or 10 circular lights in a vee shape along it's edge. the lights were not very bright, more like a soft, yellowish glow...Like on dim. it moved somewhat quickly across the sky and over the backyards of our street. we watched it as it traveled to the end of the yards, then made a sharp right turn, went a short distance, made another sharp right turn, and then a sharp left turn. we were running around to the front of the house to get a better look, when it made another final left turn and disappeared into the night sky. the entire event lasted about 20-30 seconds. we have hesitated to share this story with others, for fear of ridicule, but after finding your site listed in an article in our newspaper about other sighings in the area, we felt compelled to tell our story. the sighting was so amazing and unexplainable, we are convinced that we did in fact see a ufo.
content.summary: Triangular with 8-10 lights in vee shape.

content.detailedDescription: Note: the unknown object, which was seen above kleive, norway on 25 january 2009 at 0:40 a.M. was a lantern. this is consistent with the observation of the object. the object was orange, and after a while the light dimmed and went out.
content.summary: Note: unknown object seen over kleive, norway on 25 january was a lantern.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home along a narrow driveway in the yard. the sky was dark but not entirely black. there were no distinct clouds, - just enough vapor to dim the stars, but not the planets.

in the narrow part of sky visible between the 3-store house (to my left) and some (leafless) trees on the right, low above the horizon, i noticed a glowing object, moving from left to right and slightly descending. the object was entirely silent. it looked like a bright planet (e. g. venus) as seen from earth, only a yellowish hue. my first thought was "a meteor"; however, the object was too bright and too slow moving for a meteor. it left no trace whatsoever.

it took about 2 or 3 seconds for the object to cross the visible part of the sky and disappear behind the row of trees that stand beside the driveway. i hesitated for 5 seconds or so (thinking over the sighting and looking intently at that part of the sky), and ran forwards along the driveway so as to close in somewhat and to leave the trees beside. the object was not there.

i thought, "so much for the ufo". it couldn't have been an airplane, because an airplane sporting this bright a light would have to be too close to me to move so silently. even if it was an airplane whose engines were off, i would have noticed its fuselage.

i turned around to the left to unlock the door, but took one more glance across my right shoulder. lo, there was the object once again! it moved from right to left this time, still slightly descending, still silent. in another 2 or 3 seconds, it was covered by the building.

the whole observed trajectory of the object could look like a piece of wide arc, going down. i only saw 2 segments of that arc. i don't even know if the second sighting was of the same object as the first. but they looked damn similar, that's for sure.
content.summary: Maneuvering glowing object in the sky. unnatural speed. silent.

content.detailedDescription:
I returned from a business meeting and was just beginning to brief one of my employees when i observed a large white orb in the air, stationary in what appeared several thousand feet upward.  it was north east of pikes peak, just sitting there. i observed it from the 4th floor of a downtown building while looking out a window.    i pointed the object out to another employee who also observed it.  we watched as the object began moving upwards and moved slowly south west over the mountain range and gaining addtional altitude.   about that time, another person appeared in the office and also observed the object.  he ran and got a pair of binoculars. i used the binoculars and saw that the object was clearly a white orb, with what appeared to be a small tail like a tear drop end facing in the direction the object was moving.  when the person went to get a more powerful pair of binoculars, the object simply disappeared.   

we discussed what we had seen, and one possibility we proposed what that a large white balloon may have become unmoored from a car dealership or something and that the sun was reflecting making the balloon much whiter and more visable to the eye at that altitude.  maybe the tail was some of the little flags that are often attached to these types of advertising balloons?  anyway, based on how the wind was blowing, we didn't think that would account for the manner in which the object was stationary for so long, its size, nor how it moved so slowy away. best guess is that it was the size of a vw bug or bigger.
content.summary: Observed object stationary north of pikes peak. then moved slowly upward and then southwest and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Taking the dog for a walk. a car was coming i was on the road so i turned to see if there was a car coming (i had ipod in) and in the car there was a bright object then a green object circular shaped came shooting down so fast towads earth. the other bright light was now gone. i'm sure it was a ufo. i had a big adrenaline rush and ran home to tell my mother. she at first laughed but then accepted. i dont think she believes me but i saw a ufo i'm positive.
content.summary: Green circular object.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my husband were sitting outside our home having a bbq around 10:30 am. my husband and son were playing washers while i was sitting watching them.

our son just got him a new digital camera for christmas and i noticed on me and my husband's colorado trip, it took such great pictures compared to ours.

i was taking random pictures of the sky. i never once noticed anything in the sky that day but clouds. our son had seen a dot on the picture when he was going through them and then came to me and asked me what this was.

i downloaded the pictures and this is what i found. there are three, one is the orginal, one with writing on it, and one up-close.

to be honest, i don't know what it is.

me and my husband both are true believers due to past and present experiences, including our trips through new mexico, arizona, colorado, nevada, and texas.
content.summary: Circle/sphere like object.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness reports that she woke up around 6:30 am for a potty break.  when she came back to bed, she heard a rumbling sound outside, so she looked out the window.  about 100 feet above the trees, she saw a huge 'thing' as she described it.  this 'thing' was about 200 feet above her house, and looked like a huge letter "a", triangular shaped, but not solid - there was a 'bridge' between the two 'legs' that would form either side of the letter "a" and on that 'bridge' was a small red light that was solid on, not flashing.  she said she could see the sky through the top part of the "a" shape and also under the 'bridge' part.  there were seven (7) white lights, one at the tip of the "a" and three down each side.  the red light was in the middle -- none of the lights were flashing.

witness said at first she wasn't sure of what she was hearing because it was more like a rumble that she could feel. when asked what it sounded like, she said it reminded her of the sound of jets in the distance, if she could relate it to anything she has ever heard before.

witness said she watched it pass by the top of her home and saw it move on in a north / north-west direction.
content.summary: Heard rumbling sound, looked out window and saw huge "a" shaped object in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

last sunday i had a rather strange encounter with a disturbing object in the sky above w���rzburg, germany. i was walking along the railroad lines along the river main to scout new fishing locations. it was already pretty late, it was getting dark, i started to freeze and i wanted to move back towards the city, when i noticed the silence. there was no car, nothing. i stopped and looked around me. although it was a pretty shitty day to be out, nature had a strange beauty in the fading daylight. suddenly i got a strange feeling in my chest, like when i was standing on a vibrating platform, but only very faint. suddenly i felt weak and then i noticed an object in the sky. it was hovering just at the base of the deep hanging clouds and dissappeared every once in a while into the moving clouds maintining its altitude. there was no sound except some light wind, only the strange humming feeling inside my body, maybe like pulsating electricity, i have no idea, i haven't felt like that before. at first, while it was still pretty close, i didn't move at all. i was like in a shock. but while it slowly moved away i realized that what i was seeing might be quite unique and took out my cellphone. i wanted to take a picture but the display wasn't working right. the images had stripes and pressing the trigger didn't do anything. only when the object was already pretty far it worked, i shot the attached picture and then, seconds later, the disk was covered in clouds once more and i never saw it again. here are a few facts:

size: can't tell, but i would guess it was pretty big, like 50 meters maybe? the clouds, although deep this day, are still a few hundred meters above ground, so the thing should be bigger than just 10 meters.

shape: flat gray disk with lights at the bottom

height: just below the clouds/ in the clouds

time: around 6 pm, dawn

speed: slowly moving across the sky

lights: three white/blueish and one red, no blinking etc.

duration: very hard to tell, it felt much longer than it probably was, maybe 15 seconds for the whole encounter


as i work for the local city administration i can not give you my real name, nobody would take me serious anymore here in w���rzburg. i never believed in aliens or ufos, but this thing got me thinking and i actually have no satisfying explanation for it. maybe you guys know more about this thing, especially because it doesn't look like the typical ufo that i have seen on the many silly photos on tv.


regards,

martin
content.summary: Felt strange vibration, saw disk hover in the clouds, tried to take cell phone photo but there were interferences, later succeeded.

content.detailedDescription:
Came from the northwest headed southeast, first one large rectangle white lights red flashing on rear, rounded on front and rear. three others were cirles, disk like red and white lights, 3 headed southeast, one headed east. the one headed east had white lights in the center and red around the disk, white lights went out and red lights started moving almost like light chaser christmas lights.  one of the small ones looked like it was doing acrobates.
i was taking my garbage can to the road around 9:00 p.M., it was a very clear night with a bright moon, and i was just looking at the sky, when i saw a large object coming from the northwest, 3 more followed within the next 30 mins, one very large and 2 smaller ones.  it was exciting, i called my nephew to ask him to get on his computer and see if it was the international space station, because i had seen it on february 14th, but this was much larger and closer, he said i should not be able to see it until 5:30 am the next morning.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One looked like a flying bus, rounded at front and back, other circle.

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is danton lee. i am a native of washington d.C. .This is my story. one night about 7 or 8 months ago i was stargazing with my meade telescope.The night was clouldless so viewing was optimal. i decided to view venus since it was the most brightest thing in the night sky. when i trained my viewfinder on the planet, i noticed a tiny glint off to the side .I thought nothing of it at first.But when i trained my main viewing scope, something strange was hovering beside venus.At first i thought it might have been glare on my lens.Thats when it slowly began to change shape.First it was a oblong-oviod.Then it became a bar with partitioned sections.I went off for a few minutes and when i came back, it had moved! it completely changed its orientation beside venus.First it appeared to the upper left.Then it was to the lower right. the best way to describe it is a transluecent shapeshifting bolide.I know it is transluecent because i could see venus through it. if it is a craft of some sort, then it is made of pure energy(hypothosis)it appears to shimmer with opalesent light.I don't know what it is. i have witnessed many things in the night sky.I have never seen anything close to this.If you wish you can view it for yourself.Thats right, its still there.Every night.Still in geosynchronous orbit.I am inviting anyone from your organization to view this object from my house. you can bring any recording/viewing equipment you like.If you wish to capture this phenomenon come between the hours of 8 and 9 pm.Contact me by email so that i can know when to stand outside to greet you. please honk three times.Thank you and i hope you take advantage of this incredible scientific discovery.Keep looking up.
content.summary: There has been something in geosynchronous orbit with venus for the last 7 months or so.Through my meade telescope it appears to be a bolide.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 9th 2007, i was in the backyard of my mother's house watching the sky through the growing cloud cover for a glimpse of the international space station and a tailing shuttle. at approximately 21:05 i saw a small object far off between a hole in the clouds northwest, on a northeast path. two minutes later, at 21:07, i saw another very similiar object in the same location, moving the same way, though it was moving more slowly than the first. i assume these were the i.S.S. and the following shuttle now, but that night i wasn't convinced and wanted to see more, so i remained outside. i kept checking the clock, because the time given for the space station's overhead pass was different than the time i had seen it and hadn't yet passed. after i checked the clock at 21:13, i decided to give the wait a few more minutes then head back inside. i sat down on the back porch step and looked skyward again. it couldn't have been half a minute afterwards when i saw a light appearing over the shed to my left. at first, i wasn't very intrigued by the light, but simply watched for a lack of anything better to do. i didn't know what it was, and i didn't have time to ponder it. then another light followed it, and another after that, and another after that one. the four lights were in a circular pattern, but there was a large circular object blotting out the sky surrounding the lights. the craft came into view slowly, very low, almost leisurely. after the craft seemed to have centered over me, it stopped and hovered. from the position of the four lights, the craft looked to be rotating in a counter-clockwise direction. i don't remember if it was rotating before it stopped. there was a dome in the center of what i could see of the craft, but i don't remember if it was a light or not. i don't think it was. the craft spanned the distance between the roof of the shed and the roof of the house.

i stood and pulled the camera i had in my lap up to take a picture of the craft (though it sadly caught only blackness). the craft hovered breifly, and then stopped rotating. it then quickly shot off to my right, southeast, over the roof. i felt and feel as though the whole event couldn't have lasted more than a two-minute maximum, but i checked the clock as soon as i couldn't see the craft anymore, and it was 21:17. i then went inside, focused on drawing what i'd seen, this being the first time i used the camera.

just recently, my mother and i took the measurements of the area between the edge of the roof of the shed and the roof of the house. using this, the craft had to have been more than 106 inches in diameter, and was at least 108 inches off of the ground. the sketch i've provided is, sadly, not the original, which has been lost. it's not the best, but i hope it'll do.
content.summary: I sighted a circular object while skywatching in my backyard on june 9, 2007.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi...

i have a few videos that i've taken over the previous couple of years that seem to be similar to other "ufo" videos i've seen on the internet. 

this past saturday, while outside with my video cam (canon optura 200) with 200 digital zoom, i focused on the moon. i'm certain, as are two other people i've shown the video to, that i video'd flashing/pulsating lights on the surface.  i'm assuming it's a craft rather than some structure, as it would have been seen before. it must be tremendous in size. i video taped the same lights two times and approx 3 hrs apart.

i'd like to know if you can recommend someone in south florida that is an expert in video analysis. someone that may be able to "clean-up" the video to provide a better image. if mufon is interested, i can burn the mini-vid to a cd and send it in to you. if you're interested, let me know where to send it.

thanks....Ek
content.summary: Flashing/pulsating lights video-taped on the surface of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving to fort worth from mckinney by way of interstate-30.  the time was approximately 7:45. she was driving and i was in the passenger seat.  it was already quite dark out as we were hours shy of day light savings' spring forward.  i recall the highway being quite busy at the time.  as we are driving through arlington, we get pretty close to six flags over texas.  looking ahead of us a few hundred yards, i see two sets of lights in the sky.  from the spot that we're in, i can see that there are two separate air crafts, but their shape was somewhat elusive as they were dark, and blended somewhat with the dark sky.  they appeared to be shaped somewhat like a bullet, even a helicopter without the blades or the tail.  originally, i did think that they were helicopters.  as we neared them my girlfriend and i could see how close these two crafts were to each other, and simultaneously yelled out that they were going to crash.  we quickly realized, however, that they were not moving at all, but hovering in place.  as we continued to get closer, we could see how close to the ground they really were - only about 60 feet above it.  confused, we both looked up as we got under them.  though their lights were, making it difficult to see, the stationary crafts' shapes were definitely not those of any flying craft i've ever seen.  they were like bullets, but bluntly tapered at one end, much like the cross-section of a domed silo on its side.  if i could compare it to anything, i'd say it looked almost as if there were two cars floating in midair there.  completely in shock from what we were seeing, and attempting to reason with ourselves what they were, she continued to drive, and i turned around and stared out the back windshield as the hovering crafts stayed there.  we finally drove out of their sight.  as we continued to drive to forth worth, our attempts at reasoning became more absurd, and succumbed to the possibility that they were paranormal objects.  dropping me off in fort worth, i told her to take the same route back and see if there was anything there that was possibly suspending the objects in the air.  when she drove back through the area, nothing was in sight.  i am extremely eager to know if anyone saw this as well!
content.summary: Hovering crafts above intersate-30 in arlington next to six flags.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i were sitting on my patio when we noticed a strange light directly west of us. it was pretty high in the sky.  it certainly was not a star, because it slowly moved around in the sky throughout the duration of our observations (about 2-3 hours).  it was not a plane and not a helicopter.  the light was intensely bright and pulsating.  we viewed the object through binoculars- it seemed dense with vibrant color changing light. we attempted to drive to the object but it was difficult to pin point.

i thought perhaps it might be a star, but i sit on my patio almost every night and have never seen anything in that position in the sky before.  also, the rate it was giving off light and changing colors was way too consistent and constant.  and it relocated position.  i am in awe of this object.
content.summary: Pulsating light seen from my patio.  very vibrant, red-green-blue.

content.detailedDescription: March  6th   2009   7:00pm   looking   out   my   bedroom  window   i   saw  above  the  tree  a   very   bright  light  i   called  both  my   sisters  son  and  my   mom   to   look  at   it.   just   then   over   the  police  radio  a   friend   told   my   mom   on   the  phone   that  other   people  at   a   party   called   the  9-1-1  center   to  report  a   brirht  light   in   the  sky.   our   next  door   neighbor   came   out  just   as   my    farthe   was   geting   out   of   the   car   looking   up   at   this  thing   in   the   sky.                         2nd   night   march  8th   2009   7:57pm  (the   bright   light   was   not   seen  on   march  7th)  on   march   8th  the   light   returned   with   a   jet   passing   near  the   bright  light   jumped  out   of   sight   then   retuned   once   the   jet   passed   by.   then   from   out   of   noware   between   8   to  10   airplanes   started   flying   all   around   the   sky.   each   time   one  of   the   airplanes   got   close  to   the   lght   it  turned  ghost   like   were  noone   saw   it   untell   the   plane  pass  by   the   the   white  light  retuned  this   2nd   night   took   place   with  our   neighbors  watching   with   us  a   total  of   7  people  saw   the   light  the   2nd   night  march  8th  2009   from   7:57pm  to    8:30pm   then   the   light   moved  s.W.  and   was   gone   from   sight.                     march  9th  2009  for   a   3rd  time   the   bright   light  retuned    with   2   jets  flying   around   and  more   airplanes  going   after  the   white  light.  this   took   place   from  7:58pm  ubtell   8:41pm   then   the   light  was   gone   again.
content.summary: A bright light in the night sky seen by many people.

content.detailedDescription: Saturday night at 11:50 pm i was locking up the house for the night when i noticed a bright blue light in the western sky at approximately 30-40 degrees above the horizon.  at first i thought it was venus, then i realized that it was not a round shape - rather, it was a long, cigar shape or teardrop shape hanging vertically in the sky.  it almost looked like three lights, one on top of the other, and each one slightly smaller than the other one. it was partly cloudy and from my vantage point i could see no stars in the sky.  the size was approximately the length of my thumbnail held at arm's length, and 1/2 the width.  it was brighter than venus and completely blue.  i called my brother, who looked outside and could see nothing from his house.  he lives in independence and his house is on top of a big hill.  i watched the object for 20 - 30 minutes but it never moved. it was too cold outside to go out with binoculars or the telescope, but i can't understand why i didn't at least grab a camera and take some pictures. it was bright enough that it would have shown up.  here i am a mufon field investigator and i didn't get a camera or binoculars and even look through the window.  very strange. for the next 5 nights in a row, my daughter and her son and i all watched the sky for the object to appear again but it never did.
content.summary: Bright blue teardrop in independence, mo

content.detailedDescription: to the person in the comers rock section of elk creek,va.I live in  wythe county just outside r.R.I have known for a while what you now know.It's reality and i will explain it if you are interested.You can contact me at:jhayhen51@gmail.Com.
content.summary: Event in comers rock section of elk creek,va.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were out in the back looking at the newborn pigs and were sitting on a picnic table just looking up at the stars. we observed and watched a star like object in an east west movement which was varying in speed and direction. the airplane traffic patterns here in central florida run north and south. any object we see crossing east west we watch carefully. the event lasted about 5 minutes give or take 30 seconds. as the object moved it went in spurts and headed due north and then back to east several time. mighty sloppy flying for a plane. the object was an intense blue white, no flashing or different colors same size as average star but much brighter. as far as altitude goes there were several planes in the near vicinity it appeared to be higher than the planes were.

we watched until it disappeared into the clouds and we could not find it again.
content.summary: "star" moved east to west  in a jerky motion changing directions frequently.

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night 03/07/09 shortly before 7:pm eastern time i was sitting in my vehicle which was parked in the driveway at my home in chester connecticut.I was listening to a rough mix of a track which i had just recorded in the studio the previous evening when i noticed a bright object coming into view in front of me. looking towards my back yard into the neighboring property there is a very steep hill where at the top it is tree lined,it was above the top of the trees which i saw the bright light emerging from a distance.I really didn't think much of it at first figuring that this was maybe just a large aircraft. being that there was nothing else present in the sky {at least from my vantage point within the car} at the time that all of this was occurring the light really seemed to stand out and i figured that i would just follow the flight path of this object since it would probably be heading almost directly over my vehicle in a short time, suddenly the object appeared to stop before it reached the treetops of the neighboring property. in the dark it's very hard to judge the actual distance away that this object was but i'm thinking maybe at least a half a mile? i continued to watch the object sit completely stationary in the sky and of course i now knew that my interpretation of what i was watching in the sky was totally incorrect, this couldn't be an airplane. i must have sat in my vehicle for at least 5 minutes or so with my eyes fixed to the object and never once saw that it was moving, as a helicopter might move around when it's trying to hold a steady position. the object looked more or less roundish in shape and extremely bright {almost yellowish}, like a huge bright star only at least four times or more as bright and large as any star might ever be. at one point as i was still sitting there i observed a small airplane fly relatively close by the object dwarfing it in size. it definitely makes me wonder whether the small plane was also checking out the same thing that i was? the next thing that i did was go into the house to tell my wife about what had just occurred and also knock on my landlords door so that they could both also be witness to what i was seeing. all three of us then went out onto the back porch and viewed the object which remained motionless in the sky to the naked eye, i'd also like to state that there was no audible sound associated with it,at least from where our point of reference was. while we were observing the object i had called my brother on the phone to inform him and also decided to try and find a pair of binoculars which i knew i had in the house somewhere. when i was unable to find the binoculars i went back outside, a few minutes or so probably had passed. once back outside i noticed that the positioning of the object now looked different to me, also the light did not seem quite as bright. i continued watching the object but i could now tell that the object was moving back in the direction which it had originally come from {northwesterly}.It just seems awfully odd to me that something could or would sit in one position in the sky without any movement for such an extended length of time, my estimate being close to 30 minutes long!
content.summary: Observed bright lights coming towards me as i sat in car. the object then stopped and sat stationary for about 30 minutes before moving back in direction it came from.

content.detailedDescription:
my nephew-in-law and were in his front yard at the corner of martha and alpine streets. i was telling him about the comet lulin and where i thought we might see it in order to show his children. from his property on any clear or partly cloudy night , you can observe commercial aircraft coming out of the houston, texas airports headed east toward florida and the east coast. we are familiar with where these planes fly, how fast they move, their lights and general behavior. we can also see the aircraft moving in the commercial lanes going west. the ones going west are farther to the south, about the same altitude, speed, navigation lights, etc as the ones headed east.
we had been discussing comet lulin for about 4-5 minutes when i noticed the object come into view. it appeared out from behind the trees in the yard, moving at a speed made 5 to 7 times the speed of the jets. it was at a much higher altitude. it appeared as a solid green object, long and thin, with a cross section approximately one fifth to one sixth its length. it left no visible trail and when we had both observed the object for about 6 or 7 seconds together (i had pointed it out to him after i had seen it originally) it simply disappeared, turned off, vanished. my nephew-in-law stated that he had seen this in the past, but was not sure about what to sat or who to report it to. 
we discussed what the possible explanations might be; a satellite that passed into the earth's shadow, the fabled aurora spyplane, or some other high tech government vehicle that is not known to the public.
i have had flight training in both fixed wing and rotary wing aircraft. i have a very good knowledge of what conventional aircraft can do and the speed of this object was well beyond anything that we can build, that is known to the public.
content.summary: Looking to the south we witnessed a greenish object moving at a very high rate of speed from west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
I was over at my girls house and decided to go home. upon arrival i exited my vehicle and looked up at the mountains, it had been a little overcast earlier and from the left side of the dam over was just clear as a bell. the right side of the dam out towards fontana was still a little overcast. as i'm standing there just about to turn and go inside the house i saw something that caught my eye moving toward the dam.To my suprise i saw six round balls of light going towards the dam.  i took a few seconds to gather myself and realize what i was looking at was something out of the ordinary.The balls seemed to hover at very slow rate of speeds. moving just a little to the left or right of the dam.And then when they got over the dam they just took off to the right into cloud cover .I looked for them for a few more minutes but to no avail. i remember at that time thinking there is no way that anyone will believe what i just saw.But i did.
i just wanted to know if anyone else in or around upland ca. saw the same thing that i did.Please let me know.
content.summary: Six round balls of light.

content.detailedDescription: We were smoking some pot when it happened. the object flew from left to right but some of us thought it flew from right to left. who will ever know what happened ! it was scary at the time but the next day it was mysteriously not there anymore. i still have nightmares about it. perhaps it was the russians or the chinese. someone is watching us - that i know. pass the dutchie from the left hand side.
content.summary: Flew from right to left slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
My non-believer husband and a female neighbor saw this.  i asked as many questions i could think of to get this description of the object and it's actions.  it's like asking a caveman to describe a helicopter.  i'll do the best i can.  

he and the neighbor's wife and two pet dogs had walked across the yard to overlook the creek.  the area is completely wooded, with thick undergrowth, but the yard is up above overlooking seiad creek.  suddenly this "thing" appeard, they both saw it, and one of the dogs that also saw it barked at it.  it acted as if it saw them, and immediately slipped into the thick trees and underbrush where my husband and this lady said it was "impossible!" to penetrate.  she asked my husband, "did you see that?" as if she couldn't believe what she saw.  he confirmed that he had.  now, months later he is still reluctant to talk about.  he simply doesn't know what he saw.

while the details were still in his mind i asked him for a detailed description.  if  you will try to follow....

i listened to his first description and decided to try to get a picture of it in my mind.  i took three (3) 3"x5" card and laid them end to end.  then overlaped the second card about 1/2 inch over the end of the first card and did the same for the third card, overlapping the second card.  then moved the second card up about 1" above the first card, and moved the third card about 1" above the second card.  he agreed that this was the shape.  only it was between 15 feet and 20' long and maybe 8 to 10 feet high.  it was thin, metallic looking, a grey-beige (platinum (sp?)color.

it was flying in a flat position over the creek, undulating, as it flew.  when it seemed to see my husband and neighbor, and seemed to hear the dog bark and immediately turned to the left and went into that thick brush, which my husband said was "impossible."

my first thoughts were that it was some kind of recording instrument, that it was collecting information on the creek.  keep in mind, where we live it is a small town (350 people) along the klamath river.  there are approximately 10-15 houses max along the creek for the 5 miles of seiad creek road.  the creek does contain some gold.  there used to be a platinum (got to look up the spelling of that word!) mine up above where the houses are.  this is just a little thread of humans living among "government property".  something like 85 percent of land in siskiyou county is in private hands.

i might as well mention also, that this is "bigfoot" area.  some people feel that somehow bigfoot and ufo's are connected.  there are several stories told by "reliable" people of ufo's in this area.  i'm one of those people who really, really don't want to see one.  there are some memories that i just do not want on my memory bank, mainly bad vehicle accidents and ufo's.  just thought someone else should know about this.
content.summary: Strange shaped kite, flat, thin, metallic, flying just a few feet above creek.

content.detailedDescription: An object like an egg was far too bright and went on his long yellow light was sure that was not a plane
content.summary: I saw  an object like an egg very bright.
